headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. For this endpoint, use application/json .

parameters.name: lead_source
parameters.description: The source of the lead. Enum values: INSTANT_FORM : a lead generated through an Instant Form. DIRECT_MESSAGE : a lead generated from a direct message of the associated Business Account. Default value: INSTANT_FORM .

parameters.name: advertiser_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when you want to create a test lead under an ad account. Advertiser ID. Note : If you pass in this field, you need to be an Admin of the ad account. To obtain the list of ad accounts that you have Admin access to, use /bc/asset/get/ . Set asset_type to ADVERTISER and select ad accounts with the returned advertiser_role as ADMIN .

parameters.name: library_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when you want to create a test lead under a form library of a Business Center. ID of a form library. To obtain the list of form libraries within a Business Center, use /page/library/get/ .

parameters.name: page_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when lead_source is INSTANT_FORM or not specified. Not supported when lead_source is DIRECT_MESSAGE . The page ID of an Instant Form. To obtain a list of Instant Forms, use /page/get/ and set business_type to LEAD_GEN .

meta_data.campaign_name: test lead: dummy data for campaign name
meta_data.adgroup_name: test lead: dummy data for ad group name
meta_data.ad_name: test lead: dummy data for ad name

lead_data.name: Jane Doe
lead_data.Availability: test lead: dummy data for Availability
